title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: Fresh romaine lettuce with parmesan cheese, croutons, and creamy Caesar dressing.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Seasoned ground beef in crispy taco shells with lettuce, cheese, and salsa.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A colorful mix of fresh vegetables stir-fried with soy sauce and ginger.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: Soft and chewy cookies loaded with chocolate chips and baked to perfection.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: Traditional Italian pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella, and fresh basil.

title: Greek Salad
summary: Fresh cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, and feta cheese with olive oil and herbs.
